blogPost.excerpt: SocialProofed is the easy way to embed Instagram feeds, Facebook reviews, and Google testimonials on your website...in just 60 seconds!
blogPost.body: SocialProofed is the easy way to embed Instagram feeds, Facebook reviews, and Google testimonials on your website...in just 60 seconds!
blogPost.title: SocialProofed - Make commerce a social experience.
blogPost.author: Mark

localize.description: SocialProofed是在您的网站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook评论和谷歌推荐的简单方法......只需60秒！您只需在您的网站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook评论和谷歌推荐。
localize.tagline: 让商业成为一种社交体验。

localize.description: SocialProofed是在您的網站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook評論和谷歌推薦的簡單方法......只需60秒！您只需在您的網站上嵌入Instagram feeds、Facebook評論和谷歌推薦。
localize.tagline: 讓商業成爲一種社交體驗。

previous.excerpt: ❤️ Open source 🤖 Native 🔌 Plugin system ⌨️ Custom hotkeys ⬆️ Sort options by frequency of use 📦 Small size (less than 20mb) Spotter is a productivity tool, the main function is to search and launch applications actions and applications themselves.
previous.title: Spotter - Productivity tool that allows you to launch everything

localize.description: ❤️开源 🤖原生 🔌插件系统 ⌨️自定义热键 ⬆️按使用频率排序选项 📦体积小(小于20mb)Spotter是一个生产力工具，主要功能是搜索和启动应用的动作和应用本身。
localize.tagline: 生产力工具，允许你启动一切

localize.description: ❤️開源 🤖原生 🔌插件系統 ⌨️自定義熱鍵 ⬆️按使用頻率排序選項 📦體積小(小於20mb)Spotter是一個生產力工具，主要功能是搜索和啓動應用的動作和應用本身。
localize.tagline: 生產力工具，允許你啓動一切

next.excerpt: Plot combines your calendar, health and finances to give you a personalized overview of your life so you can manage what’s important. By integrating with your Apple Calendar and Health apps with your finances, Plot pulls-in and organizes your information.
next.title: Plot 2.0 - a calendar, health and personal finance app all in one

localize.description: Plot结合了你的日历、健康和财务，给你一个个性化的生活概览，让你可以管理重要的事情。通过整合你的Apple日历和健康应用程序与你的财务状况，Plot将你的信息拉进并组织起来。
localize.tagline: 一款集日历、健康和个人理财于一身的应用。

localize.description: Plot結合了你的日曆、健康和財務，給你一個個性化的生活概覽，讓你可以管理重要的事情。通過整合你的Apple日曆和健康應用程序與你的財務狀況，Plot將你的信息拉進並組織起來。
localize.tagline: 一款集日曆、健康和個人理財於一身的應用。
